headline: Assessing VICI Properties (VICI) Valuation After Recent Performance Trends
summary: VICI Properties (VICI) has recently caught the attention of investors following its latest performance numbers. The real estate investment trust posted annual revenue growth of 3% and net income growth of 5%. These trends invite a closer look at current valuation. See our latest analysis for VICI Properties. This year, shares of VICI Properties have gradually lost momentum, with the 1-year total shareholder return slipping to -5.53%. The short-term share price return sits just below flat, but...
